attributionInfo.infoString10:
The property listing data and information set forth herein were provided to MLS Property Information Network, Inc. from third party sources, including sellers, lessors and public records, and were compiled by MLS Property Information Network, Inc. The property listing data and information are for the personal, non commercial use of consumers having a good faith interest in purchasing or leasing listed properties of the type displayed to them and may not be used for any purpose other than to identify prospective properties which such consumers may have a good faith interest in purchasing or leasing. MLS Property Information Network, Inc. and its subscribers disclaim any and all representations and warranties as to the accuracy of the property listing data and information set forth herein.

The MLS listing information displayed is deemed reliable, but is not guaranteed accurate by the MLS.

attributionInfo.agentName: Witter & Witter Boston / Cape Cod Connection

description: Two-family in an incredible South Boston location in need of gut renovation. This sale is subject to Eastern Division Housing Court Department Docket # 25H84CV000142. The property is to remain under the supervision of the court and the receiver until all violations are corrected and a certificate of occupancy is issued. The sale is subject to Court Approval. Do not enter the property or walk around the premises without being accompanied. The Listing Broker must accompany all visits. Property is to be shown during daylight hours to qualified buyers only. Please schedule visits with Chris. THE SELLER ADVISES THAT NO PERSON ENTER THE STRUCTURE LOCATED ON THE PROPERTY DUE TO ITS DANGEROUS CONDITION, and be prepared to sign the Hold Harmless Agreement before being allowed on the property. Offers will be due 8/18 and reviewed by the judge on 10/24. Buyers to submit proof of experience with successful past projects

telephoneConsumerProtectionActDisclaimer.text: By pressing Next, you agree that Zillow Group and its affiliates, and real estate professionals may call/text you about your inquiry, which may involve use of automated means and prerecorded/artificial voices. You don’t need to consent as a condition of buying any property, goods or services. Message/data rates may apply. You also agree to our Terms of Use. Zillow does not endorse any real estate professionals. We may share information about your recent and future site activity with your agent to help them understand what you’re looking for in a home.

textAttributes.tooltipText: “Real estate professionals” includes the real estate agents and brokers, mortgage lenders and loan officers, property managers, and other professionals you interact with through Zillow. Zillow Premier Agent is an advertising program that helps connect customers to local real estate professionals. Zillow Premier Agent partners are paid advertisers and are not affiliated with Zillow, Inc. brokerage or any of its affiliates.
